definition: lit. to hope one's daughter becomes a phoenix (idiom)/fig. to hope one's daughter is a success in life
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: This is that parents long to see the son succeed in life, look at the woman Cheng Feng's only method?
sentences.chinese: 這難道就是家長們望子成龍，望女成鳳的唯一做法嗎？
